title: Are you Looking For South Florida Resort lifestyle! Check this 2/2
posting_body: ['Wow!', 'This is it!', 'Resort style living!', 'Enjoy fantastic views of the intracoastal waterways and modern high rises from this beautiful 18th floor unit in a building that is directly on the beach!', 'This spacious apartment has 2 extra large bedrooms, 2 baths, walking closets, open concept dining/living room with bar area perfect to share family memories and live the South Florida lifestyle.', 'Full-services building offering amenities including 24/7 concierge service, valet parking, beach chair/towel service, fitness center, sauna, spa/hot tub, tennis courts, restaurant, barbecue area, and more!', 'Very well located, perfect to walk to shops, restaurants, the beach, etc. is currently undergoing a multi-million dollar renovation that will make it one of the premier condos in the area.', '***Please Text DALIT to', 'show contact info', 'For Details & Pictures***', 'Brought to you by Dalit Rosenfeld at La Rosa Realty, Greater Fort Lauderdale REQUIREMENTS: 630+ credit score, income must be at least 2x rent, no prior evictions, clean background.', 'Should be able to provide current proof of income.', 'Move-in cost: 1st month rent due upon offer acceptance to secure unit for you off market, Last Month rent, and Security deposit due at move-in.', '*', '***', 'show contact info', '***  For more Properties HERE!', '<URL>']
